participant_abstract.sent: Each person was asked by the project manager to draw a picture of his favourite animal, describe characteristics of the animal and tell why he liked it so much.
Each person contributed in the discussion about possible key features the remote control should have such as ergonomic design, latest technology and original new designs.

participant_actions.sent: Follow our individual roles as outlined in the beginning and research enough to come up with answers for the new product.

participant_decisions.sent: Original was the key to the discussion, the remote control must try and achieve originality in the market .
Latest technology should be employed but within price range.

participant_problems.sent: Could not employ expensive LCD touch screen technology as too costly .
How to decide what the ON button turns on and sets up the TV,DVD,sound system.
